message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product that I think you'll really love. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to let it go for $15000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $14000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $14000. Would you be willing to consider $13000? I think it's a more reasonable price for this product.

I understand you're still hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you a slight discount, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $14500 now. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my costs.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $13000, as I mentioned earlier. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make a profit. I can offer you the product for $14000, and I'll throw in some additional perks, such as a free maintenance package and a 1-year warranty. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate the additional perks you're offering, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $12500. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if it's not accepted.

Bob, I understand you're firm on your price, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $13500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'll throw in the maintenance package and warranty, and I'll also give you a 5% discount on the total price. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
I'm not willing to go above $12500. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider purchasing the product from another seller.
